name: angry
content:
angry adjective
(EMOTIONAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 having a strong feeling against someone who has behaved badly, making you want to shout at them or hurt them: He's really angry at/with me for upsetting Sophie. I don't understand what he's angry about. [ + that ] They feel angry that their complaints were ignored. I got really angry with her. It made me really angry. Synonyms
